ygData.subject: Re: Fwd: I run the shadow knight mailing list
ygData.msgSnippet: not to be rude myself, but, who has the time to sit and wait for the general messageboard to come up within its 5-10 minutes? I know this sounds
ygData.messageBody:
not to be rude myself, but, who has the time to sit and wait for the
general messageboard to come up within its 5-10 minutes?
I know this sounds overexaggerated, but it takes too long, so I do not go
there anymore.

the only message board I visit is the Rathe, since that is the server I
play upon. and now that is coming to be slow.

if you say that its because of all the posts or the ads, well something
needs to be done. I've NEVER had to wait so long for the battle.net boards,
or any other boards, clanwise or gamewise, you name it, to come up. and
quite frankly, I don't have patience anymore, I ran out of that virtue none
too long ago.

I posted intelligently, and flamed (due to me being in a rather bad mood
during the day in the first place, not their fault, but it still peeved me)
about them doing something about their board.

If someone could perhaps give me a website with a good board, particularly
class-based or server-based, and not having to deal with the slowness of
the vault, I would highly appreciate it if the URL was posted or given to
me, thanks in advance


>
> Check out the posts on General messageboard by Bathory, she makes some
> really cogent arguments that are intelligent, thoughtful, and
non-inflammatory.
>
